entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming west 50 km/h gusting to 70 this morning then diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 50 km/h gusting to 70 late in the afternoon. High 13. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
